extendedInfo.description: Features of this clock widget- Displays time and date in multiple cities and time zones   - Digital & Analog Clock- A lot of color and appearance settings- 3D look to better fit Fancy Widget look- supports GMT and ZULU timezones tooCompatible also with major popular launchers: LauncherPro, ADW Launcher, Zeam, Home++Keywords: th-app-promo-reborn

reviews.title: Nice Little App
reviews.comment: Didn\'t think it was going to work on the Nexus at 1st as you add widgets to the homescreen in a different manner to the one described in instructions. On about the 6th attempt to add the widget the Nexus way it popped up with the configuration screen. No idea why & I don\'t care, it got there in the end ... the point being if you have a nexus don\'t just ditch it if it doesn\'t work 1st time & it\'s a nice little handy app worth having.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thumbs up.
reviews.comment: Very useful app. Worth  downloading. *UPDATE* already using this app on both mobile phone that I have - Cherry Mobile W900 and Samsung GT-B5330 and it is still working great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Stable, adequate customization and widgets, good App, highly recommended. Well done developer. Xperia Pro
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Nice little app that is easy to use, has lots of features and works perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great widget & Alarm app
reviews.comment: Has proven to be a reliable alarm & a great widget. Love the widgets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small & reliable
reviews.comment: I work with teams in multiple time zones and have 5 set to global local times so I can quickly coordinator decisions and meetings. Easy, painless & convenient.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great must have app!!
reviews.comment: Great! Helps me know the time in afghanistan where my husband is at! I love that it refreshes automatically & it accurate!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but useful
reviews.comment: This app pretty much did what it says. Simple but very useful
reviews.author: Wilkan Gautama

reviews.title: Neat and Nice
reviews.comment: This is neat, nice and small app which is over much useful to check the different time right on the hone screen. I love the widget\'s UI.
reviews.author: Karthik Palanivelu

reviews.title: World clock rating
reviews.comment: Was a bit confusing to use at first... I like the size of the clock. It doesn\'t take up that much room on your homescreen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: 5 stars - Just what I was looking for, great app, thanks, I definitely recommend. I checked out the Youtube instructions which were very helpful. Very impressed. Thanks again!

reviews.title: Sits there and tells the time
reviews.comment: Great app, functional and tweakable (not many options for customising on free version). Would recommend.
reviews.author: David Fox

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: It is a good app it is easy and good, i love this app
reviews.author: Nisrine Islah

reviews.title: Military family
reviews.comment: This app has really helped my husband and I keep our time difference correct so we don\'t call each other in the middle of the night, etc. Love it!!!

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I needed it to keep track of time in boston,USA so dat i cn dcide wen to cl my bf who is there fr a few months. And it served it\'s purpose nicely

reviews.comment: You have buy the pro version to get what you see on the ad. No thank you. Why pay for what you get for free.. God is alive and is real. He really loves you so much that he give His Son Jesus Christ for your sins. No Jesus no Heaven and no God. Read John 3:16-17. God bless...

reviews.title: Simple and it Just works which is perfect for me
reviews.comment: 3 timezones on my home page means I can easily plan when to connect with family and friends at a glance. Easy to customise colours to make each stand out clearly. CV
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful for scheduling mtgs
reviews.comment: I work for a firm with offices and service centers all over the world.  This app helps me to see quickly what time could work best when scheduling a meeting with staff in different countries or when different tome zones in the US. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does exactly what it should
reviews.comment: It\'s a free clock widget, it does exactly what you would expect, and it does it well. More configurable, and thus better, than the Android built-in one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1.
reviews.comment: It will not update the time after the tablet is turned on or exits sleep mode. I have to go open the config page and save and close the app to get it to show the selected time zones. Then it works fine until the tablet powers down again.
reviews.author: A Google User
